abstract: Olympus Corporation, responding to accusations of fraud, says acquisition fees paid to unidentified advisers amounting to 30 billion yen ($391 million) were not excessive and followed proper accounting procedures.
snippet: Responding to accusations of fraud, the company says that fees amounting to $391 million were not excessive and followed accounting procedures.
